mapper.insert: insert into tbl_file (file_path, file_name, file_original_name, file_size, file_content_type) values (#{filePath}, #{fileName}, #{fileOriginalName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileContentType})
mapper.select: SELECT f.id, mpf.member_id, f.file_path, f.file_name, f.file_size, f.created_date, f.updated_date, f.file_original_name, f.file_content_type FROM tbl_member_profile_file mpf join tbl_file f WHERE member_id = #{memberId} and f.id=mpf.id
